channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉将于1月下旬开启Cyber​​truck中国行-外媒
item.description: A China-wide tour showcasing Tesla's flagship Cybertruck pickup will kick off in late January, with eight trucks simultaneously on display in eight cities including Shanghai and the capital, Beijing, media outlet the Paper said on Tuesday.翻译:据澎湃新闻周二报道，特斯拉旗舰款 Cyber​​truck 皮卡全国巡展将于 1 月下旬拉开帷幕，8 辆卡车将在上海、首都北京等 8 个城市同时展出。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国监管机构从网站上删除了视频游戏规则草案；股价上涨
item.description: China's gaming regulator has removed from its website rules it proposed last month aimed at curbing spending and rewards that encourage playing video games, checks by Reuters on Tuesday showed, in a move that boosted gaming company shares.翻译:路透社周二的调查显示，中国游戏监管机构已从其网站上删除了上个月提出的旨在限制鼓励玩视频游戏的支出和奖励的规定，此举提振了游戏公司的股价。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 中国山体滑坡死亡人数上升至11人 救援人员仍在搜寻失踪者
item.description: The death toll from a landslide in China's Yunnan province rose to 11 on Tuesday as rescue workers battled freezing temperatures and snow to locate dozens of missing people.翻译:周二，中国云南省山体滑坡造成的死亡人数上升至 11 人，救援人员在严寒和大雪中奋力寻找数十名失踪人员。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国正在考虑2780亿美元的股市救助计划 - 彭博社
item.description: Chinese authorities are considering a package of measures to stabilise a slumping stock market, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道称，中国当局正在考虑采取一揽子措施来稳定暴跌的股市。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 供应线索不一，油价稳定，中国前景谨慎
item.description: Oil prices were little changed on Tuesday as traders weighed a host of conflicting supply and demand worries, with rising tensions in the Middle East and cold weather woes disrupting production in the United States.翻译:周二油价几乎没有变化，交易员权衡了一系列相互冲突的供需担忧，中东紧张局势加剧，寒冷天气扰乱了美国的生产。
item.author: Emily Chow, Trixie Yap

item.title: 路透调查显示韩国第四季度经济增速可能略有放缓
item.description: South Korea's economy expanded at a slightly slower pace in the final three months of 2023 compared to Q3 as elevated interest rates held back domestic demand despite higher exports, according to economists polled by Reuters.翻译:路透社调查的经济学家表示，与第三季度相比，韩国经济在 2023 年最后三个月的扩张速度略有放缓，因为尽管出口增加，但利率上升抑制了内需。
item.author: Veronica Khongwir

item.title: 日本股市触及 34 年来新高，日元下跌，因日本央行按兵不动
item.description: Japanese shares surged on hopes the Bank of Japan will not pivot away from its super easy policy any time soon.翻译:由于希望日本央行不会很快放弃其超级宽松政策，日本股市飙升。
item.author: Stella Qiu

item.title: 日本央行按兵不动，日元下跌；中国市场救援谈话有利于人民币和澳元
item.description: The yen fell broadly on Tuesday after the Bank of Japan (BOJ) maintained its ultra-loose monetary policy in a closely watched policy decision, matching market expectations.翻译:日本央行（BOJ）在备受关注的政策决定中维持超宽松货币政策，符合市场预期，周二日元普遍下跌。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 中国音乐学生因涉嫌威胁活动人士而面临美国审判
item.description: A Chinese music student went on trial on Monday on U.S. charges that he harassed an activist who posted fliers at the Berklee College of Music in Boston supporting democracy in China and threatened to report her activities to Chinese law enforcement.翻译:周一，一名中国音乐学生在美国受审，罪名是骚扰一名在波士顿伯克利音乐学院张贴支持中国民主传单的活动人士，并威胁要向中国执法部门举报她的活动。
item.author: Nate Raymond

item.title: 中国“乏善可陈的复苏”对美国经济没有产生强烈影响——布雷纳德
item.description: China's lackluster economic recovery has not had a particularly strong effect on the U.S. economy given diversification of supply chains over the past years, White House National Economic Council Director Lael Brainard said on Monday.翻译:白宫国家经济委员会主任莱尔·布雷纳德周一表示，鉴于过去几年供应链的多元化，中国经济复苏乏力并未对美国经济产生特别强烈的影响。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 加拿大为何限制外国学生？谁会受到影响？
item.description: Canada's immigration minister said the government will introduce a temporary, two-year cap on the intake of foreign students after explosive growth in recent years aggravated the country's housing shortage. Here is what is at stake.翻译:加拿大移民部长表示，在近年来的爆炸性增长加剧了该国的住房短缺之后，政府将对外国学生的招生实行为期两年的临时上限。这就是关键所在。
item.author: Wa Lone

item.title: 中国科考船前往马尔代夫可能引起印度担忧
item.description: A Chinese research vessel is on its way to the Maldives, according to an Indian military official and an independent researcher, as new Maldivian President Mohamed Muizzu deepens ties with Beijing, distancing from New Delhi.翻译:据印度军方官员和独立研究人员称，随着马尔代夫新总统穆罕默德·穆伊祖加深与北京的关系，远离新德里，一艘中国科考船正在前往马尔代夫。
item.author: Krishn Kaushik

item.title: 独家：中国游说各国在联合国审查前赞扬其人权记录——外交官
item.description: China has been lobbying non-Western countries to praise its human rights record ahead of a key U.N. meeting where it will face questions and criticism over its actions in Hong Kong and Xinjiang, according to diplomats and documents.翻译:据外交官和文件称，中国一直在游说非西方国家在联合国重要会议之前赞扬其人权记录，届时中国将因其在香港和新疆的行为而面临质疑和批评。
item.author: Emma Farge

item.title: 数据显示，在中国销量依然疲软的情况下，外国汽车品牌增加了出口
item.description: Foreign carmakers that have been losing market share to local rivals in China have boosted exports from the world's largest auto market, accounting for more than a fifth of the country's total vehicle exports last year, industry data showed.翻译:行业数据显示，市场份额一直被中国本土竞争对手夺走的外国汽车制造商却增加了中国这个全球最大汽车市场的出口，占中国去年汽车出口总额的五分之一以上。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 2023年中国住宅丧失抵押品赎回权将增加43%
item.description: The number of foreclosed homes in China rose 43% year-on-year in 2023, according to a private survey on Monday, highlighting a worrying trend of rising mortgage delinquencies amid a sustained property market slump and a patchy economic recovery.翻译:周一的一项私人调查显示，2023年中国止赎房屋数量同比增长43%，突显出在房地产市场持续低迷和经济复苏不平衡的情况下，抵押贷款拖欠率上升的令人担忧的趋势。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管经济放缓，北京仍提高了2024年的增长目标
item.description: China's capital city Beijing has set a growth target of around 5% for 2024, surpassing last year's target of above 4.5%, despite expectations of slower growth for the national economy.翻译:尽管国民经济增长预期放缓，但中国首都北京仍设定了2024年5%左右的增长目标，超过了去年4.5%以上的目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在漫画中警告其稀土面临“海外”威胁
item.description: China's chief intelligence agency posted on social media a comic strip featuring foreign-looking characters secretly extracting rare earths, in a story portraying the country's strategic metals under threat from covetous "overseas organisations".翻译:中国首席情报机构在社交媒体上发布了一幅连环漫画，其中有外国角色秘密开采稀土，故事描绘了中国的战略金属受到贪婪的“海外组织”的威胁。
item.author: Liz Lee

item.title: 在对限制查阅裁决的计划提出强烈抗议后，中国誓言司法披露
item.description: China's top court has pledged to "deepen judicial disclosure" after its plan to curtail access to court decisions faced unusual public criticism from lawyers and legal experts.翻译:在限制查阅法院判决的计划遭到律师和法律专家不同寻常的公开批评后，中国最高法院承诺“深化司法公开”。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 中国新疆南部发生里氏5.1级地震 - GFZ
item.description: A magnitude 5.1 earthquake struck southern Xinjiang, China on Monday, the German Research Centre for Geosciences (GFZ)said.翻译:德国地球科学研究中心（GFZ）表示，周一，中国新疆南部发生了 5.1 级地震。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国不顾制裁让俄罗斯在2023年成为最大石油供应国
item.description: Russia leapfrogged Saudi Arabia to become China's top crude oil supplier in 2023, data showed on Saturday, as the world's biggest crude importer defied Western sanctions to purchase vast quantities of discounted oil for its processing plants.翻译:周六的数据显示，俄罗斯将在 2023 年超越沙特阿拉伯，成为中国最大的原油供应国，因为全球最大的原油进口国不顾西方制裁，为其加工厂购买大量折扣石油。
item.author: Andrew Hayley
